divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading home from a friends house in Sanford, Maine at around 7:00 pm on RT 202 (also called Lebanon Rd). When I got to the top of Mt. Hope and was turning with the road towards the west at a short downhill grade,what looked like a large cluster of lights to my left caught my attention. I've been on this road countless times and never had any kind of experience like this. I think the reason it caught my attention because of the size of this thing.I was probably around 1-3 miles away and it looked to be around 4 inches tall and three inches across. There were alot of lights on this thing but they all looked to be separated by some distance. There was a center mass that had sections coming off of it in multiple directions,much like the space station. It didn't seem to move as I drove along. It reminded me of the way the UFO's in the movie "Independence Day" just seemed to float. I was a distance from this thing so I didn't hear any noise. I drove approximately a mile in a westerly direction and as the road turned to the left and downhill in a southerly direction I couldn't see the object anymore. It was gone!! I'm not quite sure what to think about this, but I sure wish I had had a camera.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sanford
There were no other sightings in Sanford on or around March 25th 2010
Summary: I saw strangely configured lights in the sky.
